title: Startling Evidence
body: <p>I just found this startling evidence from the <a href="http://home.earthlink.net/~hardiboy/id1.html" title="Area 52">Almost Daily News</a>:<br /><a href="http://home.earthlink.net/imagelib/sitebuilder/misc/show_image.html?linkedwidth=560&amp;linkpath=http://home.earthlink.net/~hardiboy/sitebuildercontent/sitebuilderpictures/harx.jpg&amp;target=_self" title="Rampant Hardimania (with names too numerous to mention)"><img src="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/images/19/o_harx_evidence.jpg" alt="startling evidence" /></a><br />I am now the shortest of the grandsons.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-10-25

Startling Evidence

I just found this startling evidence from the
Rampant Hardimania (with names too numerous to mention)
